message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000.  What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product might be high, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $12000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $17000, but I need to stay above that price to make this worthwhile.  Let me know if that's something you can work with.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Given my financial situation, I would like to propose a price of $15000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
